title: Bristol fashion
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Terry Ashwood and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: The history and development of the Port of Bristol - the only major municipally owned port in Britain. Illustrates the facilities available in the city docks and at Avonmouth and Portishead, and discusses plans for the expansion of dock services. Sequences on the history of architecture of Bristol are interwoven.
